com.limelight.videosdk

Class ContentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.videosdk.ContentService

  • public class ContentService
extends Object
    This class facilitates developer and SDK in making requests to Lime light server and fetching various data like channel group, channels,media and encodings. This exposes APIs for the developers. It uses connection class to check if the connection exists before making the requests.It also uses URLAutheticator to authenticate the requests by using developer details stored in setting.It stores the list of channel groups, channels, media, encodings and delivery. This class stores the organization account details like organization id, access key and secret.
    Author:
    kanchan

      static interface  ContentService.ChannelCallback
      A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching channels.

      A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Channel Group.
      static interface  ContentService.EncodingsCallback
      A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Encoding.
      static interface  ContentService.MediaCallback
      A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Media.

      • getAllChannelGroup

        public ArrayList<ChannelGroup> getAllChannelGroup(boolean isLoadMore)
                                           throws Exception
        This method will fetch all the channel groups on server. This is a blocking call.
        Parameters:
        isLoadMore - True if load more called else false.
        Returns:
        list of channel groups.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getAllChannelGroupAsync

        public void getAllChannelGroupAsync(boolean isLoadMore,
                           ContentService.ChannelGroupCallback callback)
        This method will fetch all the channel groups on server. This is as asynchronous call and list of channel groups is returned in callback.
        Parameters:
        isLoadMore - True if load more called else false.
        callback - ChannelGroupCallback

      • searchMedia

        public ArrayList<Media> searchMedia(boolean isLoadMore,
                           String operator,
                           String title,
                           String description,
                           String originalFilename,
                           String tag,
                           String state,
                           String mediaType,
                           String channelId,
                           String created_after,
                           String updated_after,
                           String published_after)
                             throws Exception
        This method searches for media on server as per the search parameters supplied.
        Parameters:
        isLoadMore - true if load next page
        operator - And / OR - Optional
        title - Title of Media - Optional
        description - Description of Media - Optional
        originalFilename - Name of the original file - Optional
        tag - Tag of Media - Optional
        state - state of Media(published/unpublished) - Optional
        mediaType - Type of media MediaType- Optional
        channelId - channel id for the medias - Optional
        created_after - String holding the Date the media is created after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        updated_after - String holding the Date the media is updated after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        published_after - String holding the Date the media is published after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        Throws:
        Exception

      • searchMediaAsync

        public void searchMediaAsync(boolean isLoadMore,
                    String operator,
                    String title,
                    String description,
                    String originalFilename,
                    String tag,
                    String state,
                    String mediaType,
                    String channelId,
                    String createdAfter,
                    String updatedAfter,
                    String publishedAfter,
                    ContentService.MediaCallback callback)
                      throws Exception
        This method searches for media on server as per the search parameters supplied. This is as asynchronous call and list of media is returned in callback.
        Parameters:
        isLoadMore - true if load next page
        operator - And / OR - Optional
        title - Title of Media - Optional
        description - Description of Media - Optional
        originalFilename - Name of the original file - Optional
        tag - Tag of Media - Optional
        state - state of Media(published/unpublished) - Optional
        mediaType - Type of media MediaType- Optional
        channelId - channel id for the medias - Optional
        created_after - String holding the Date the media is created after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        updated_after - String holding the Date the media is updated after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        published_after - String holding the Date the media is published after, date should be in unix format - Optional
        callback - MediaCallback
        Throws:
        Exception

        callback - ChannelCallback

      • setPagingParameters

        public void setPagingParameters(int pageSize,
                       String sortBy,
                       String sortOrder)
        Method to set the paging parameters.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The number of results to return per page. The default and maximum page size is 500. Example: page_size=100
        sortBy - The field by which the results should be sorted. It has values like publish_date, create_date, update_date
        sortOrder - The order in which the results should display. It has values like asc or desc

      • appendPagingParameters

        private String appendPagingParameters(String url,
                            Map<String,String> params)
                               throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method appends the paging parameters to the request URL.
        Parameters:
        url - Request URL
        params - Paging Parameters
        Returns:
        Paging Parameters appended URL
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException

      • getDeliveryForMedia

        Delivery getDeliveryForMedia(ArrayList<Encoding> encodingList)
        Creates a delivery from an array of encodings. It first creates a map of unique encodings URLs as key and the corresponding encodings list as value. Then it creates a list of deliveries from this map. Then it finds the suitable delivery from this list of deliveries. This is based on the priority of primary use of the deliveries.
        Parameters:
        encodings -
        Returns:
        Delivery

      • getEncodingsByUrl

        private Map<Uri,ArrayList<Encoding>> getEncodingsByUrl(ArrayList<Encoding> encodingList)
        This method creates a map of unique encodings URLs as key and the corresponding encodings list as value.
        Parameters:
        encodingList -
        Returns:
        Map of Encoding Uri and Encoding List

      • getSuitableDelivery

        private Delivery getSuitableDelivery(ArrayList<Delivery> deliveryList)
        This method has the logic to find the suitable delivery from a list of deliveries. This is based on the priority of primary use of the deliveries.
        Parameters:
        deliveryList -
        Returns:
        Delivery
